name: tm68
effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Giga Impact to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can’t move on the next turn.
